DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effectiveness , long-term safety explore safety efficacy factor WILLIS™ intracranial stent graft system clinical application .
DOC.brief_title: New Covered Stent ( Willis ) Endovascular Reconstruction Intracranial Vessel Wall Defects Registry
DOC.detailed_description: Intracranial aneurysm cerebrovascular disorder weakness wall cerebral artery vein cause localized dilation ballooning blood vessel.WILLIS® intracranial stent graft system indicate treatment intracranial aneurysm . This study multi-center , prospective registration study . Recruiting 100 specific patient undergo treatment WILLIS intracranial stent graft system , give anti-platelet aggregation drug medical therapy . Patients enrol undergo one-year follow-up .
DOC.criteria: Age 18 ; Arterial wall defect conform image examination due internal carotid artery , vertebral artery aneurysms various cause ; Target lesion vessel reference diameter 3.54.5mm ; Investigators believe patient suitable interventional therapy WILLIS intracranial cover stent ; Participate study voluntarily , accept follow study sign Informed Consent Form . Existence branch artery ( eg anterior choroidal artery , posterior communicate artery , posterior inferior cerebellar artery , etc . ) target lesion may cause severe neurological dysfunction occlusion ; No suitable vessel entrance , diseased artery extremely tortuous ; Coagulation disorder serious heart , liver , kidney dysfunction systemic infection , suitable interventional treatment ; Life expectancy < 1 year ; Contraindications heparin , aspirin , clopidogrel , anesthesia , Xray contrast agent ; Mental disorder
